text: Ezɨ Jonatan kamaghɨn Devit mɨgei, “Nɨ navir amɨrizim sara mangɨ. Ga fo, ga Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ziamɨn, akar gavgavim akɨrigha gɨvagha ghaze, ga zurara deraghvɨra uaning damuam. Eghtɨ gɨn gan ovavir boriba uaghan kamaghɨra arazir kam damuam.” A mɨkemegha gɨvazɨ, Devit danganir igharazimɨn zuima, Jonatan uamategha uan nguibar ekiamɨn ghu.
